Package Classes

Class Actor

java.lang.Object
Classes.Actor
All Implemented Interfaces:
iActorBehaviour, iReturnOrder
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionalClient, OrdinaryClient, SpecialClient, TaxInspector
public abstract class Actor extends Object implements iActorBehaviour, iReturnOrder
Represents an abstract Actor in the system.
